name: Legend of gaim demo
description:
Important Info that you need to read before play

-------------------------------------------------------------------

When you get to the part where it say end and you load to the next area, it will wrap to the very beginning of the level. So it's recommended to change to disk 2 or click green flag to play again from the start.

Scratch release:https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/782432746/

My youtube:https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCuxyaySN_8_O8DVlt6j0x4Q
